scripts.dev:clean: npm run clean && npm run di:reset && npm run dev
scripts.di:clean: bun -e "import {ConfigManager} from '@tdi2/di-core/tools'; ConfigManager.cleanOldConfigs(0); console.log('üóëÔ∏è Cleaned all DI configs');"
scripts.di:clean-keep-recent: bun -e "import {ConfigManager} from '@tdi2/di-core/tools'; ConfigManager.cleanOldConfigs(3); console.log('üóëÔ∏è Cleaned old DI configs, kept 3 most recent');"
scripts.di:reset: npm run di:clean && npm run di:enhanced
scripts.di:info: tsx -e "console.log('üîç DI Debug Info at: http://localhost:5173/_di_debug'); console.log('üìã Interface Mappings at: http://localhost:5173/_di_interfaces'); console.log('üìã Config List at: http://localhost:5173/_di_configs'); console.log('üîÑ Force Regenerate: POST to http://localhost:5173/_di_regenerate');"
scripts.di:validate: bun -e "import {EnhancedDITransformer} from '@tdi2/di-core/tools';  const t = new EnhancedDITransformer({verbose: true}); t.transform().then(() => t.getDebugInfo()).then(info => { console.log('‚úÖ Validation completed'); console.log('üìä Results:', info.validation); if (!info.validation.isValid) { console.error('‚ùå Validation failed'); process.exit(1); } });"
scripts.di:check-config: bun -e "import {ConfigManager} from '@tdi2/di-core/tools'; const cm = new ConfigManager({srcDir: './src', outputDir: './src/generated', enableFunctionalDI: true, verbose: true}); console.log('üèóÔ∏è Current config:', cm.getConfigHash()); console.log('‚úÖ Config valid:', cm.isConfigValid()); const existing = cm.findExistingConfig(); if (existing) console.log('‚ôªÔ∏è Existing config found:', existing);"
scripts.dev:fresh: npm run di:reset && npm run dev
scripts.dev:check: npm run di:check-config && npm run dev
scripts.test:interfaces: tsx -e "import {InterfaceResolver} from '@tdi2/di-core/interface-resolver.ts'; const r = new InterfaceResolver({verbose: true}); r.scanProject().then(() => { console.log('‚úÖ Interface scanning completed'); console.log('üìã Implementations:', r.getInterfaceImplementations().size); console.log('üîó Dependencies:', r.getServiceDependencies().size); const validation = r.validateDependencies(); console.log('‚úÖ Validation:', validation.isValid ? 'PASSED' : 'FAILED'); if (!validation.isValid) { console.log('‚ùå Issues:', validation); } });"
scripts.test:io: bash -c 'select f in $(find . -type f -name "*.test.ts"); do [ -n "$f" ] && exec bun test "$f"; done'
